metadata.title: CVE-2014-3545 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.xbefore 2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 allows remote authenticated users toexecute arbitrary code via a calculated question in a quiz.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3545` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
